name: @kevinoid/eslint-config
description: ESLint shareable config for @kevinoid's style (based on airbnb).
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.lint: npm run lint-es && npm run lint-rules
scripts.postpublish: git push --follow-tags origin main && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md
scripts.test: npm run test-peer-versions-ci && npm run lint && npm run test-eslint
scripts.test-eslint: npm run test-eslint-ie11 && npm run test-eslint-node && npm run test-eslint-webextensions && npm run test-eslint-wsh
scripts.//: Test that config can be loaded and works on empty input.  Note: echo prints 'ECHO is on.' in cmd.exe, : produces no output in cmd.exe or sh.
scripts.version: npm run changelog && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && "${npm_config_shell:-${SHELL:-bash}}" && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.version-deps: npm install conventional-changelog-cli david depcheck git-branch-is hub-ci-status
